posts.text:
Razer Deathadder 2013 leikjamús með nýjum skautum.
Verð: 5 þúsund
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Genius SW-G2.1 1250 2.1 Speaker System
Solid hátalarakerfi fyrir peninginn, kom mér skemmtilega á óvart.
Adjustable Volume and Bass controls
Ultra-rigid MDF wooden cabinet subwoofer with rich and deep bass
Total output power 38 watts (RMS)
Curvaceous satellite speakers with hook design
4-piece 2.1 speaker system includes control box
Adjustable volume and bass controls
Magnetically-shielded 3-inch cones
MDF wooden cabinet subwoofer with 5.25-inch drive unit
Curvaceous satellite speakers with hook design
linkur: 
https://www.amazon.com/Genius-SW-G2-1-1250-Speaker-System/dp/B0056BPUQC
Verð: 10 þúsund
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fanatec Rennsport Wheel stand fyrir leikjastýri
 SELT
Features
Allows the use of a racing wheel without table in the living room
Easy to store away within 10 seconds
Attractive design both in operation or in storage leaning on a wall
Rock solid steel / Aluminum construction avoids shaking even with strong Force feedback wheels
Adjustable: wheel angle, height, pedal position
Big rubber feet avoid any movement
Porsche wheel and G25 shifter mount (optional)
Designed in Germany by real Germaneering®
Compatibility
All Fanatec Porsche racing wheels
CSR, CSR Elite & ClubSport Wheels
Logitech: Driving Force, Driving Force Pro, Driving Force GT, G25/G27
Thrustmaster: T500RS
Microsoft wireless wheel (optional adapter)
Linkur: 
https://www.gamesmen.com.au/rennsport-wheel-stand-by-fanatec
Verð: 10 þúsund
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ViewSonic VX2433wm
 SELT
Type : 23.6" wide Color TFT Active Matrix LCD 16:9 aspect ratio
Display Area : 23.6 inch
Optimum Resolution : 1920x1080
Contrast Ratio : 1000:1 (typical), 20000:1 (DCR)
Brightness : 300 cd/m2 (typ)
Viewing Angles : 170° (H), 160° (V) at 5:1 c/r
Response Time : 2 (G to G), 5ms (on/off)
Panel Surface : Anti-Glare, Hard coating (3H)
Light Source : 50,000 hrs (typ.)
linkur: 
http://www.viewsonic.com.au/products/archive/VX2433wm.php
Þessi er með HDMI og hátölurum
Fast verð: 5000 kr
Lítið notað Logitech G27 leikjastýri
 SELT
Linkur: 
https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-941-000045-G27-Racing-Wheel/dp/B001NT9TK4
Verð: 35 þúsund
Er með tvær Air Series SP120 Quiet Edition High Static Pressure 120mm viftur til sölu.
 SELT
Verð: 2 þúsund stykkið
MSI Nvidia GTX550ti 1GB
 SELT
Verð: 3 þúsund
Sími: 698-9096 Atli
G27 stýrið og vifturnar eru líklega seldar.

Mig vantar wheel stand og skjá. Þarf ég að uppfæra fartölvuna ef ég tengi skjáinn þinn við hana? Verður lagg?
Getur einhver pro sagt mér hvað er best að gera?
Ég sendi þér pm.
Standurinn og skjárinn seldir. Deathadder enþá til sölu og 2.1 hátalarakerfi bætt við.
